question: Who won the Australia Open Super Series Title?
explanation: Indian shuttler Kidambi Srikanth won the Australian Open Superseries Trophy in Sydney. He has defeated Olympic champion Chen Long. Srikanth has won in straight games 22-20, 21-16 to win his career's 4th Super Series title and become only the fifth player in the world and the first Indian male shuttler to contest three consecutive Super Series finals.
